sentences.english: After reunion dinner, we started our snow mountain journey!
sentences.chinese: 吃过团年饭，我踏上了前往雪山的旅途。

sentences.english: Longer trips will incur a small charge.
sentences.chinese: 再长点的旅途则会稍微收点小钱。

sentences.english: Travelling merchants supported these home-town inns where they stayed in their travels.
sentences.chinese: 旅行的业主门在旅途中支持这些家乡式的城市客栈。

sentences.english: This can turn a frustrating experience into the trip of a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 这能将一次糟糕的旅行转变为人生旅途中难忘的经历。

sentences.english: I am lonely if I have nocompanyon the journey.
sentences.chinese: 旅途中如果没有同伴，我就很孤单。

sentences.english: On the journey home, the joy of the farm labourers was beyond description.
sentences.chinese: 还家旅途上，农民工的喜悦心情无法形容。

sentences.english: One of Tai Shan's caretakers and a veterinarian from the Washington National Zoo are expected to accompany them on the journey.
sentences.chinese: 泰山的一个饲养员和一名兽医希望在旅途中陪伴泰山。

sentences.english: Yes, well, that may be the proximal cause of our journey.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，这可能是我们这趟旅途最近似的原因了。

sentences.english: I wish you a pleasant trip on behalf of my company and in my own name.
sentences.chinese: 我代表公司并以我自己的名义祝你旅途愉快。

sentences.english: An open-topped bus ride became an essential part of the journey back from the Final.
sentences.chinese: 从归来的旅途中，趟篷大巴旅行成为重要部分。

sentences.english: Life is a long journey, challenges keep pace with opportunites during this journey.
sentences.chinese: 生命是一场短途游览，在旅途上有应战和机缘。

sentences.english: I am alone on my life's Journey up to now.
sentences.chinese: 我独自的一个人在人生的旅途中行走直到现在。

sentences.english: Part of this journey is learning to consume in the new culture.
sentences.chinese: 这个旅途的一部分就是学习如何在新文化中消费。

sentences.english: You finally reached the beginning of life, a journey of intersection. No, perhaps NO.
sentences.chinese: 你终于走到了人生的开端，第一个旅途的岔口。

sentences.english: At that time Saint Louis was one of the last cities or towns you would find if you were traveling west.
sentences.chinese: 那时圣路易斯是西进旅途上能发现的最后的城镇之一。

sentences.english: During the trip, Darlene and I took turns driving so that neither of us would tire out.
sentences.chinese: 旅途中，达伦和我轮流开车，这样才不会有人累垮。
